name: Feed Me Plz (Andreas Express)
description:
This was made for the Occupational Therapy Jam at my university, with my team's theme being "dementia". We wanted to do a game based around unfamiliarity and memory loss while also involving a relaxed activity (in this case feeding your cats).

It was made by me (design and programming), Spuk (design and art) and Orla Ni Haodha (occupational therapy consultant).

Important!! This game also appears on mine and Spuk's account "Heist at Crazyworld", so it's nothing fishy if you see it twice.
